Package org.nodes.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Compressor<T>
    A compressor defines a compression of a class of objects.
    Distance<T>  
    Generator<P>
    Represents a class which can generate random real valued multivariate points.
    Metrizable<T>
    A class is metrizable, when there is a natural distance function over pairs of instances of the class.

    Maintains a list of the top k largest elements seen.

    OnlineModel<T>
    A KT estimator for observing and encoding a sequence of tokens.
    OnlineModelTest  
    Order
    An order represents a shuffling of the integers from one to 'n' The methods are named from the point of view that this object represents a mapping from a list of things to a re-ordered version of that list.
    Pair<A,B>
    Simple semi-immutable pair to store two objects
    Pair.NaturalPairComparator<A extends java.lang.Comparable<A>,B extends java.lang.Comparable<B>>  
    Pair.PairComparator<A,B>  
    Permutations
    From http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2000048/stepping-through-all-permutations-one-swap-at-a-time Based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steinhaus%E2%80%93Johnson%E2%80%93Trotter_algorithm#Even.27s_speedup
    Series
    This class provides helpful functions for defining series of numbers as lists.
